item.title: About
item.description:
My Name Is Swarit Acharya

I am a software developer, student and guitarist.

I love making projects and this blog is one of them.

Expect to read about:

  • New code practices that have helped me.
  • Apps that have been beneficial.
  • Fun projects I make.
  • Physics and Maths concepts I find interesting.
  • A little bit of philosophy and ideas from podcasts.
  • Some guitar riffs I make :)

Overall pretty excited to see how this turns out! Cheers!

item.title: Why I Am Starting a Blog
item.description:
